languages.text: "Нет, Паскаль, радоваться смерти этого выродка — самое естественное, что только может быть в этой проклятой Императором дыре".
languages.translation_comment:
Killed Marazhai in the arena.
Pasqal: "The unit is experiencing an irrational sense of satisfaction at the death of the xeno-unit Marazhai. The nature of the phenomenon is anomalous."

traits.locale_text: "Нет, Паскаль, радоваться смерти этого выродка — самое естественное, что только может быть в этой проклятой Императором дыре".

languages.text: "No, Pasqal, rejoicing at that miscreant's death is the most natural thing that could occur in this Emperor-damned place."
languages.translation_comment:
Killed Marazhai in the arena.
Pasqal: "The unit is experiencing an irrational sense of satisfaction at the death of the xeno-unit Marazhai. The nature of the phenomenon is anomalous."
languages.original_text: "Нет, Паскаль, радоваться смерти этого выродка — самое естественное, что только может быть в этой проклятой Императором дыре".

traits.locale_text: "No, Pasqal, rejoicing at that scumbag's death is the most natural thing that could occur in this Emperor-damned place."
"No, Pasqal, rejoicing at that scumbag's death is the most natural thing that could occur in this Emperor-damned place."

languages.text: 「いいや、パスカル。皇帝に呪われたこの場所で、あの悪党の死を喜ぶのは、これ以上なく自然なことだ」
languages.original_text: "No, Pasqal, rejoicing at that miscreant's death is the most natural thing that could occur in this Emperor-damned place."

traits.locale_text: 「いいや、パスカル。皇帝に呪われたこの場所で、あの悪党の死を喜ぶのは、これ以上なく自然なことだ」

languages.text: "Nein, Pasqal, sich über den Tod dieses Abschaums zu freuen, ist das Natürlichste, was in diesem Loch überhaupt geschehen kann."
languages.original_text: "No, Pasqal, rejoicing at that miscreant's death is the most natural thing that could occur in this Emperor-damned place."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Pasqal, sich über den Tod dieses Abschaums zu freuen, ist das Natürlichste, was in diesem Loch überhaupt geschehen kann."

languages.text: « Non, Pasqal. Se réjouir de la mort de ce scélérat est la chose la plus naturelle qui puisse se produire dans cette ville maudite. »
languages.original_text: "No, Pasqal, rejoicing at that miscreant's death is the most natural thing that could occur in this Emperor-damned place."

traits.locale_text: « Non, Pasqal. Se réjouir de la mort de ce scélérat est la chose la plus naturelle qui puisse se produire dans cette ville maudite. »

languages.text: «No, Pasqal, regocijarse por la muerte de ese bellaco es lo más natural que podría ocurrir en este lugar dejado de la mano del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "No, Pasqal, rejoicing at that miscreant's death is the most natural thing that could occur in this Emperor-damned place."

traits.locale_text: «No, Pasqal, regocijarse por la muerte de ese bellaco es lo más natural que podría ocurrir en este lugar dejado de la mano del Emperador».

languages.text: “不是这样，帕斯卡。在这个被帝皇诅咒的地方，因为死了个异形渣滓感到开心，这实在是在正常不过的事情。”
languages.original_text: "No, Pasqal, rejoicing at that miscreant's death is the most natural thing that could occur in this Emperor-damned place."

traits.locale_text: “不是这样，帕斯卡。在这个被帝皇诅咒的地方，因为死了个异形渣滓感到开心，这实在是在正常不过的事情。”

languages.text: "Hayır Pasqal. O imansızın ölümüne sevinmek, İmparator'un belası bu yerde gayet normal."
languages.original_text: "No, Pasqal, rejoicing at that miscreant's death is the most natural thing that could occur in this Emperor-damned place."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır Pasqal. O imansızın ölümüne sevinmek, İmparator'un belası bu yerde gayet normal."

languages.original_text: "No, Pasqal, rejoicing at that miscreant's death is the most natural thing that could occur in this Emperor-damned place."
